Class CDayPjController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.CDayPjController

  • public class CDayPjController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the controller for the CDayPj page
    Author:
    Kristiyan Tomov

        private java.util.ArrayList<Projection> projections
        The list of projections available on this date. It is going to be useful to check whether the input from the customer corresponds to a projection (for validation of the input).

        public void loadProjections()

      • bookSeats

        public void bookSeats(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        Takes care of the action of clicking on the button Book seats. It performs validation of the input: first it checks whether there are any projections at all on the current day and secondly it verifies whether the input corresponds to an existing projection for the current day. If all is well, it loads and sends the user to the next page which is CBooking.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • isInPjs

        Checks whether the input corresponds to a real projection.
